project_title.text: Audio Production for People with Vision Impairments

project_preview_description.text: This project focuses on building novel accessible tools for creating audio-based content like music or podcasts. The tools should support the needs of blind creators, whether working independently or on teams with sighted collaborators.
Researchers: Bryan Pardo, Anne Marie Piper, Jack Wiig, Abir Saha, Thomas McHugh, Cooper Barth, Robin Brewer, and Andrew Karp

siteMetadata.title: Northwestern University
siteMetadata.description: Next Generation Content Production Tools for People with Vision Impairments.
siteMetadata.author: Northwestern Inclusive Technology Lab, Interactive Audio Lab, and Collab Lab
